name: Dreamwalker Legguards
tooltip:
Dreamwalker LegguardsLevel 60

Rayne at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make Dreamwalker Legguards if you bring her the following: 1 Desecrated Legguards, 20 Wartorn Leather Scraps, 8 Cured Rugged Hides and 1 Nexus Crystal.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Legguards
- Wartorn Leather Scrap x 20
- Cured Rugged Hide x 8
- Nexus Crystal
